EmailTemplate.name: 29/03/2013 - Foundation Lunch Menu Term 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Foundation Lunch Menu Term 3
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
This is a gentle reminder that the lunch menu for Term 3 is due this Wednesday, 3th April.
Below is the link to the lunch menu for term 3:
Foundation Lunch Menu Term 3 (https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QIb/_I.lTb4We.aFgeL7I0tNwBIYb1XMK1meVBu0SnRegP8=)
Please would you kindly make your selections and return the completed menu to Azizan at azizan.sallehhuddin@britishschool.edu.my no later than Wednesday 3rd April. You can also hand it in at the school reception.
Thank you for your support and cooperation
Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
